Text:
What's the source?  I assume DVD Screener, since the WEB-DL didn't show up till the day after this was posted.

Also you should provide some technical specs.  I find it very doubtful that this is highres unless it is an upscale.  

Either way, your presentention sucks balls.  If you aren't willing to provide any decent information about your uploads very few people will ever bother with them.
then I guess I wasted my time on this site and will ask all my stuff be taken down  fuck you all
Don't sweat it Mrta79, there are a lot of us who appreciate the effort.

QborT isn't exactly a shining example anyway. QborT, stop being an asshole for no reason. I checked the one upload you have, and there was no relevant info on it. While Mrta79 has uploaded tons of stuff. In short, fuck off QborT if you can't respect another's efforts.
